channel.title: Password help on my server!
channel.description:
hey i need help with my characters passwords....
I cant tell players there pass because when I go into the char folder, and look at the pass thing it says a bunch of numbers?
can anyone tell me how to change that so it says the real pass?
and ::pass downt work on my server....
PLZ HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Password help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Well, you dont always have to have the working ::pass command. You can always go into the files, you char files, and search the person you want the pass too. Like making someone an admin, mod or co owner/ owner, just you will see there username and password at the top. Some sources have like a bunch of numbers as their pass.

Let me see if i can get the working ::pass command.

  • Nope sorry, dont have my source on this comp. PM me later and I can get it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Password help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @BaracudaX BaracudaX
item.description:
@BaracudaX wrote:

well some servers bases are like this but i dont think you should be peeking at the passes anyway

id like to help you with ::pass but i am currently on school computer and dont have my source downloaded

if u don’t get it soon pm me and il send it to u later

Read full topic
